adjectives.description: oversecure (comparative more oversecure, superlative most oversecure)

verbs.description: oversecure (third-person singular simple present oversecures, present participle oversecuring, simple past and past participle oversecured)

examples: As discussed in Chapter 4, “Planning for Governance,” you need to carefully consider the implications of “oversecuring” content. If every site is locked down for Read access, it will be hard to achieve your knowledge management objectives.
